title: Brochure And Envelope, "The Graphic Art of Paul Rand, University of Hartford", after 1970
signed: Signature imprinted in red ink on cover, lower right: Paul Rand
inscribed: On envelope: imprinted in red ink upper left corner: The Graphic Art of Paul Rand/ Joseloff Gallery/ Harry Jack Gray Center/ University of Hartford/ West Hartford/ Connecticut, 06117; On second page of brochure: imprinted in white ink on upper left: The Graphic Art of Paul Rand/ February 20-March 23, 1990/ Opening Reception February 20, 5-7 pm; On 3rd page: imprinted on upper left: Joseloff Gallery/ Harry Jack Gray Center/ University of Hartford/ West Hartford, Connecticut, 06117; on upper right: 11-4 Monday thru Friday/ 12-4 Saturday
dimensions:
Brochure closed: 22.2 x 19.1 cm (8 3/4 x 7 1/2 in. )
Brochure opened: 22.2 x 38 cm (8 3/4 x 14 15/16 in.)
Envelope: 22.9 x 22.8 cm (9 x 9 in.)
description:
Four page brochure printed in red on white. Recto: four red squares cut and placed to resemble rooster head in reserve, with fifth smaller red square as eye. On second page: red ground with white writing on upper center of page with details and exhibition dates. On third page: red background with white writing on upper center of page in two blocks detailing exhibition location and times.  On fourth page: blank.

Envelope: square on cream paper with exhibition title and return address in red ink, upper left corner.
